feed.title: UCD Blog | Isabella Huang
feed.subtitle: Blog for CSCI 5839, written by Isabella Huang.

entry.title: Intro
entry.content:
Hello! My name is Isabella Huang, and I use she/her/hers pronouns. I am a PhD student in Cognitive Science and Computer Science, working with Tammy Sumner.

Hereâ€™s a photo of me scarfing down a semi-frozen burrito after day broke on an alpine start this summer. And another photo of me further along the backpacking loop at Buckskin Pass, ecstatic after meeting Bucky the mountain goat.
entry.summary: Hello! My name is Isabella Huang, and I use she/her/hers pronouns. I am a PhD student in Cognitive Science and Computer Science, working with Tammy Sumner.
